stories.text:
Whisker is seeking a Software Test Engineer / remote friendly. Innovative product lines, with the best technology - we create connected pet care and are ever pushing the boundaries. You will be responsible for developing test documentation, procedure, and executing the tests on various software products produced by software engineering. Testing responsibilities will cover mobile apps, backend API, and firmware. Tests may be conducted manually or automated depending on the situation. We are looking for someone who has: 1 yr of experience testing iOS and Android applications Script language programming skills Compiled language programming skills

Direct Hire, long term career growth, competitive compensation package.

Email resume to achan@whisker.com or Apply here: https://www.linkedin.com/jobs/view/2652665611/?alternateChannel=search&refId=ujrgFFimUHBQ3ZXjHWWJxA%3D%3D&trackingId=gkXI6Bho0xM14Jbjz8Va9A%3D%3D
